pr_title: Fix issuing revoked access tokens when SMS OTP is set as 2nd step

timeline.message: Set correct authenticated IdP value to AuthenticatedUser object

timeline.bodyText:
Since this should always be local idp we can set it as FrameworkConstants.LOCAL_IDP_NAME[1]

  
    
      identity-inbound-auth-oauth/components/org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/identity/oauth2/util/OAuth2Util.java
    
    
         Line 3423
      in
      02ddac2
    
    
    
    

        
          
           authenticatedIDP = FrameworkConstants.LOCAL_IDP_NAME;
timeline.author: janakamarasena

timeline.message: Set correct authenticated IdP value to AuthenticatedUser object
Set correct authenticated IdP value to AuthenticatedUser object
